lead_paragraph: Prime Minister David Cameron said that classes would be financed for female Muslim immigrants, and warned that some could be deported if they failed to reach certain standards.
snippet: Prime Minister David Cameron said that classes would be financed for female Muslim immigrants, and warned that some could be deported if they failed to reach certain standards.

headline.main: Britain: English Classes Urged to Combat Muslim Extremism
headline.print_headline: Europe; Britain: English Classes Urged to Combat Muslim Extremism

abstract: British Prime Min David Cameron announces government will use fund of $28.5 million to finance English classes for female Muslim immigrants, warning that some may face deportation if they fail to reach certain standards.
